resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107914</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107914</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202586</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Composing a Letter of Application</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestehen eines Bezugsrechtsantrags</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Composer une lettre d'application</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compôr uma letra da aplicação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Componendo una lettera di applicazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνθεση μιας επιστολής της εφαρμογής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Componer una carta de la aplicación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will learn the importance of letters of application, what letters of application should contain, and how to format the letters. They will also enhance their composition skills, language skills, and proofreading skills.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erlernen den Wert der 
Bezugsrechtsanträge, welche Bezugsrechtsanträge enthalten sollten 
und wie man die Zeichen formatiert. Sie erhöhen auch ihre 
Aufbaufähigkeiten, Sprachenfähigkeiten und das Korrekturlesen von 
von Fähigkeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apprendront l'importance des 
lettres de l'application, quelles lettres d'application devraient 
contenir, et comment formater les lettres. Ils mettront en 
valeur également leurs qualifications de composition, capacités 
linguistiques, et corriger des qualifications.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aprenderão a importância das 
letras de aplicação, que letras de aplicação devem conter, e como 
formatar as letras. Realçarão também suas habilidades da 
composição, habilidades de língua, e corrigir habilidades.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi impareranno l'importanza delle lettere
dell'applicazione, che lettere dell'applicazione dovrebbero contenere 
e come formattare le lettere. Egualmente aumenteranno le loro 
abilità della composizione, le abilità di linguaggio e la correzione
delle bozze delle abilità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα μάθουν τη σημασία των επιστολών της 
εφαρμογής, τι οι επιστολές της εφαρμογής πρέπει να περιέχουν, και
πώς να σχηματοποιήσουν τις επιστολές. Θα ενισχύσουν επίσης 
τις δεξιότητες σύνθεσής τους, τις γλωσσικές δεξιότητες, και τις 
δεξιότητες διόρθωσης δοκιμίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aprenderán la importancia de 
cartas de la aplicación, qué cartas de la aplicación deben 
contener, y cómo formatar las cartas. También realzarán sus 
habilidades de la composición, habilidades de lenguaje, y corregir 
habilidades.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JOYCE SHEPARD
FN:JOYCE SHEPARD
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202586</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107914</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/composing-a-letter-of-application</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
